Type_tracer.name: SoluteType
Type_tracer.description: Defines the outputs that will be given to APSIM

MolecularWeight.description: The molecular weight of the solute (g/mol)

InitialContent.description: The amount of solute at the beginning of the simulation (mg solute/kg soil)

UpperBound.description: The maximum value for the solute amount (mol/kg)

LowerBound.description: The minimum value for the solute amount (mol/kg)

ToleranceValue.description: The tolerance level for values above or below the bounds (mol/kg)
